holidays.title: National Strawberry Sundae Day
holidays.description: Hot summer days call for a sweet, refreshing treat.

holidays.title: World Chocolate Day
holidays.description: On July 7 we celebrate one of life's greatest luxuries for World Chocolate Day.

holidays.title: Alice Springs Show Day
holidays.description: We celebrate one of the biggest social and agricultural highlights in Australia.

holidays.title: Comic Sans Day
holidays.description: Love it or hate it? We have all the tips and information on this controversial typeface.

holidays.title: George Town Heritage Day in Penang
holidays.description: Celebrate Malaysian culture, history, and Penang’s colonial legacy on George Town Heritage Day.

holidays.title: Global Forgiveness Day
holidays.description: Let go of feelings of anger and resentment and create a world of healing.

holidays.title: International Peace & Love Day
holidays.description: Join the rest of the world to spread peace and love for the good of humanity.

holidays.title: National Day of Rock ‘n’ Roll
holidays.description: Grab your rocker garb and get ready to rock ‘n’ roll to some rhythmic beats.

holidays.title: National Dive Bar Day
holidays.description: Here's a deep 'dive' into dive bars and how best to celebrate these establishments.

holidays.title: National Dora Day
holidays.description: Do you know someone named Dora? Show them how much you care this National Dora Day!

holidays.title: National Father Daughter Take a Walk Day
holidays.description: Fathers and daughters spend some quality time together by going out for a walk today.

holidays.title: National Koi Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the magnificent fish we call “koi” this National Koi Day, right here with us!

holidays.title: National Macaroni Day
holidays.description: Macaroni is reportedly the most common form of pasta in the U.S.

holidays.title: Saba Saba Day in Tanzania
holidays.description: Wondering what Saba Saba is about? Join us as we explore Tanzania and its story.

holidays.title: Solomon Islands Independence Day
holidays.description: Prepare to explore the little-known history of The Solomon Islands and its culture.

holidays.title: Star Festival
holidays.description: Star Festival celebrates the long-awaited union of two lovers with lights, confetti, and merriment.

holidays.title: Tanabata
holidays.description: On this sacred night, with the stars of the milky way illuminating us, we celebrate Tanabata.

holidays.title: Tell the Truth Day
holidays.description: Truthfulness and honesty are the foundations of living with integrity.

holidays.title: Cassidy’s Birthday
holidays.description: Through multiple anthems, this Philly rapper shows that he knows how to make a hit!

holidays.title: Marc Chagall’s Birthday
holidays.description: Not bound by one medium, Chagall was never afraid to experiment throughout his art career!

holidays.title: Sky Brown’s Birthday
holidays.description: For the young professional skateboarder, this is only the beginning of an amazing career.
